Deprecated API

Interfaces
Configurable
      This interface describes an Entity that can be configured externally, usually a Startable service.

Methods
JcloudsLocationFactory#newAmazonWebServicesInstance(BrooklynProperties sysProps)
      Creates a jclouds-backed LocationFactory for use with Amazon and using credentials etc looked up in the given properties set;

      @see #limitTimeTo(long, TimeUnit)
